name: Bus Stop (mrbo)
description:
A thing that vaguely  resembles a metroidvania. Made for MetroidvaniaMonth7.

Retrieve the seven daughters of the King, while hiding from unknown creatures.

Will you bring them back to their sick father, or will you follow your dear friend, the Devil's Son?

Controls:

Arrow Keys: to move/jump

W: to diffuse in walls, floors, ceilings (some creatures will not be able to see you while hiding in a wall) and to get out of them.

A: to accept/talk

Enter: to view worldmap

Escape: to quit

I didn't have time and skills to add music and sound effects (it's my first "game").

If you don't want to waste much time, I included an image that contains the position of the NPCs that are relevant to the game.
